Run Configuration

This class specifies the configurations for an Estimator run.

run_config()

See also

Other run_config methods: task_type

Examples

config <- run_config()

# Get the properties of the config
names(config)
#>  [1] "cluster_spec"                  "evaluation_master"            
#>  [3] "is_chief"                      "keep_checkpoint_every_n_hours"
#>  [5] "keep_checkpoint_max"           "log_step_count_steps"         
#>  [7] "master"                        "model_dir"                    
#>  [9] "num_ps_replicas"               "num_worker_replicas"          
#> [11] "replace"                       "save_checkpoints_secs"        
#> [13] "save_checkpoints_steps"        "save_summary_steps"           
#> [15] "session_config"                "task_id"                      
#> [17] "task_type"                     "tf_random_seed"               

# Change the mutable properties of the config
config <- config$replace(tf_random_seed = 11L, save_summary_steps = 12L)

# Print config as key value pairs
print(config)
#> cluster_spec = NULL, evaluation_master = "", is_chief = TRUE, keep_checkpoint_every_n_hours = 10000, keep_checkpoint_max = 5, log_step_count_steps = 100, master = "", model_dir = NULL, num_ps_replicas = 0, num_worker_replicas = 1, replace = RunConfig, save_checkpoints_secs = 600, save_checkpoints_steps = NULL, save_summary_steps = 12, session_config = NULL, task_id = 0, task_type = worker, tf_random_seed = 11
